name: Smartnest
0:
”Alexa, turn on my Arduino please”
”Alexa, turn on the Switch please”
”Alexa, turn off the Lights please”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Smartnest is home automation made simple and affordable.

Smartnest skill allows you to control your devices with your voice.
ESP, Arduino, Raspberry and much more

Step by step:
1. Go to www.smartnest.cz and create a free account.
3. Create one device and give it a name
2. Enable the skill and link your account.
4. Follow the instructions in the Documentation to connect your device to Smartnest.
5. Control your device with your echo device or through Alexa App
